definition: to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism

sentences.english: Simultaneously we also make up with the inadequate paraphrase of simultaneously Chinese reference book.
sentences.chinese: 同时对现在较权威的语文工具书的训释作了一些商兑。

sentences.english: Vocabulary is not the only problem in Buddhist sutra exegesis.
sentences.chinese: 佛经文献训诂中并不仅有词义训释的问题。

definition: to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
Mr Gongyang's Annals or commentary on 春秋[Chun1 qiu1], early history, probably written by multiple authors during Han dynasty, same as 公羊春秋[Gong1 yang2 Chun1 qiu1]
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
Commentary on Shuowen Jiezi (1815) by Duan Yucai 段玉裁[Duan4 Yu4 cai2]
explaining a character or word by using a homophone
